# solias-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description         | Type                                                        | Default           |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| `disable`    | `disable`     | Disables button     | `boolean`                                                   | `false`           |
| `label`      | `label`       | Button Label        | `string`                                                    | `undefined`       |
| `styleClass` | `style-class` | Button custom class | `string`                                                    | `'solias-button'` |
| `styleType`  | `style-type`  | Button style        | `"elevated" \| "filled" \| "outlined" \| "text" \| "tonal"` | `'filled'`        |
